name: Hello Japanese: Lessons, Videos, Kanji
description: Easy Japanese (NEW)    Easy Japanese (NEW) is a program of Japanese language lessons produced by Japans public broadcaster, NHK WORLD RADIO JAPAN.    I want to go to Japan! If youve heard yourself saying that, this program is the place to start. Youll learn phrases that will get you talking, with explanations of usage and pronunciation. Tune in, whether youre visiting or staying. Chinese version coming in January 2019; other languages in October 2019.   Learn the Japanese easily through audio lessons. This feature need a internet connection but you can learn Japanese communication easier.   Learn Japanese conversation with common daily phrases and sentences.   Each episode is added here weekly!   Pronunciation recorded by native Japanese speaker
